articles.title: All systems go in Houston as Nasa prepares return to Moon this month - The Straits Times
articles.description:
HOUSTON (AFP) - Rick LaBrode has worked at Nasa for 37 years, but he says the American quest to return to the Moon is by far the crowning moment of his career.

articles.title: La Niña sea temperatures driving floods in Australia and drought in the United States and Africa - ABC News
articles.description: Australia could see more floods and America and Africa may experience ongoing drought for months to come, according to the US National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.
articles.content:
Right now, a broad plume of cool water has pooled in the Pacific Ocean, west of South America.
